p: Two authors independently performed extraction of the following information from studies meeting inclusion criteria: publication date (year), first author, country of origin, sequencing method, total numbers, and responsive number of E326K genotypes (GG/GA/AA) and alleles (G/A) in PD patients and controls. If there were conflicts, a third party was asked to make a final decision. In terms of the assessment of a publication's quality, the Newcastleâ€“Ottawa Scale (NOS) [ 9] was used.
